content.detailedDescription: I was in my mums room using the computer makeing a movie picture by picture when i sat back i saw a green oval in the sky i took a picture of it when i saw it it looked like ball lightning but when i saw it moving than i saw that it was a ufo
content.summary: Egg shaped green thing in the sky
content.locationName: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and listening to my radio. the broadcast was interrupted as a spacecraft shaped like an egg seemed to float in front of my windshield. the egg communicated to me over my radio. it advised the reason for their trip, was to explain how they were able to defy the earth's understanding of physics and the ability to go beyond the speed of light and thus beyond relativity theories. they said their next contact with me would be a mathematical brief to explain all. they also said they would do this only upon the caveat that religion does not play a role in any meetings.  the egg then seemed to become subject to earth's gravity and appeared to fall off the front of my car. i stopped to see what had happened, but all that was left was just scrambled egg.
content.summary: Message

content.detailedDescription:
Was in my back yard . i do night photography. had this feeling i should take a picture in the same place i got the ufo last fall. also saw one in the sky about a month ago..No camer on me. looked like a plane headed for the airport, but brighter and only one light, which i thought was because of a haze or this clouds. at dusk. then, it took off due north very rapidly and disappeared.
the pictures are both different, very small...Only about 5-6" wide, i would guess from the surrounding structures and trees.The first pic is clearer than the second. there is nothing behind it that could have cause this picture. still have both the original pictures on my camera.
content.summary: Got this by accident...Picture showed up on computer. second one in a year.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to land survey class after work.  noticed triangular shaped craft hovering above a nearby street intersection.  when it changed position, instantly above another intersection, i observed that there were several other craft that were all 'instatly' exchanging hovering type positions above various street intersections.  i, of course questioned what i had observed, until i noticed that there were several other people in vehicles, that had pulled off onto the shoulder of the freeway to observe the craft, just as i had done.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First noticed craft hovering above nearby street intersection

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were wading in lagoon #3 at ko olina, a resort on west oahu, from about 9:30-11:30am, april 5, 2006.  the weather was typically windy, sunny, with some clouds.  at around 10:30-10:45 a pair of f-15s in formation made 2-3 passes over the beach.  a third f-15 also made a couple of passes.  they appeared to be on landing approach to hickam afb and may have touched down a couple times.

around 11am my wife noticed a formation of white objects in the sky over the ocean to the west about 15 degrees over the horizon and drew our attention to them.  i would estimate that they were initially arrayed vertically between 2,000 and 10,000 feet.  the objects were drifting, my first thought was that they were large birds--albatross or somesuch.  after further observation it became clear that the objects were too far away for us to see them if they were birds, and their altitude was well beyond the range that such birds inhabit.  they were giving off their own light, which appeared now to be greenish-white, like stars but appearing in daylight on a sunny day.  more objects appeared over the next few minutes.  at their peak activity i counted exactly twelve of them at different altitudes.  some of the objects interacted or merged with each other, then separated again.  their darting movements are what initially made them register as birds.

by this time other people in the water and at the beach had noticed the strange objects and were observing them with us.  the objects gradually drifted south and from our vantage point gained altitude until they were at about 70 degrees relative to our position.  the objects individually "blinked out" until there were no more than three.  these last three grew fainter (presumably they were gaining altitude and putting distance between us) until they all had blinked out.  this entire encounter lasted about 10 minutes.

the f-15 patrol earlier did not appear to be making any sort of combat maneuvers when we saw them, but i speculate that they may have been at sea patrolling the area where the objects later appeared.

one theory could be decoy flares released by an aircraft.  however:

1. these objects interacted with each other, and changed direction, which is why we initially mistook them for birds
2. the objects gained quite a bit of altitude during our observation, which is inconsistent with a flare hypothesis.
3. the objects were not bunched or lined up as much as a volley of flares is.  they were "randomly" distributed over a fairly wide area.

i do not believe that these were seabirds for reasons already described and the fact that they were above any reasonable altitude for such birds.

i am certain that these were not conventional aircraft.

which makes them unidentified flying objects, that i am reporting to mufon.  i would be curious if you received other similar reports.
content.summary: Ufos - west oahu

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i had been painting my bedroom walls all morning. i was looking in my closet when i turned around to the outside wall, and inside/under the awning that covers my 48 inch window that faces the street, there were three globes of light. as soon as i saw them they began to diappear, fading out from right to left, one at a time. as soon as they disappeared (about one second - it was really fast) i ran out of my room and told my mom and grandmother what i had seen. my mom raised her eyebrows and my grandmother suggested that perhaps some ets had wanted to see what i was doing in my bedroom. she told me that often times globes of light were et intelligences. she told me about brian scott who interacted with these intelligences many years ago. i was excited, and although it would have been easy to be scared, i wasn't. i went back to working in my bedroom and nobody saw any more globes of light. i wonder if i'll ever see them again - i'm going to be working in my room this weekend to finish it up. i am 13 years old and my grandma is diane johnson, the state section director for mufon ventura and santa barbara counties. i've been to lots of mufon meetings and there are "alien" things and pictures all around the house. i've talked to people who have had sightings, but never really thought it would happen to me. now i'm curious as to why they were here. btw this happened in the early afternoon - between 1 and 2 pm and it was bright light outside, but the globes, inside the awning were brighter and about 8 inches across.
content.summary: Three balls of light appeared to be looking in my bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: As above, i was standing on my back porch looking at the full or nearly full moon when a triangular shaped shadow crossed from the lower slightly right edge to the upper slightly left edge of the moon in a straight line. i would estimate the time it took to cross at perhaps three seconds. then it passed beyond the upper edge and was not visible. i did not notice whether any stars appeared to be blocked out either before or after it passed, but it did not look to me as if the object were near the earth's surface. of course, i had no way of actually telling how near or far away it would have been. i lived in los altos when i was young and was used to seeing jets and other aircraft in the sky, and got used to looking ahead of the noise when there were sonic booms, because whatever was there would be traveling faster than the sound. there was no sound at all when i saw this apparent shadow cross the moon's surface. i just thought it was a ufo because i couldn't think of anything else it would resemble, and as i said, i grew up near moffit field and was used to seeing all kinds of aircraft.The point of the triangle which was leading appeared to be facing 'upwards' in relation to the moon, which was near its highest point in the sky. that's about all i can say about the experience. i'll try to look up the date nearer sometime, as it might be in a diary or some other record of my own. i don't know if i ever entered it on this site before - might have you can check.
content.summary: I don't have the correct year or time but will try to look it up later. i was on my back porch looking at the moon probably between ten and eleven thirty when i saw a triangular shadow cross the face of the moon-about  1/16 of  total area of full moon.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving with my father,sister and cousin (20 miles east) of the city of niagara falls, we all witnessed a strange glowing orange object,like a glowing orangish light shooting across the sky.It was traveling northeast at a fast pace. we are all positive it was not military. we had the niagara falls air base fairly close.Within a minute of seeing this, two air force jets shot across the sky, the same direction of the orb.We all knew it was after the u.F.O. my father tried to follow the strange orb but it went out of site. we used to talk about this sighting every now and then. it has been so long now that it is   
just a memory, but we will never forget what it looked like and what the truth is about u.F.O's, they do exsist !!People can be a skeptic all they want but until you actually see a real u.F.O in person, not on t.V or read about things in books, no one can truly understand. why am i writing this now? i found this site and figured what the hell, i'll give my story. i don't need to read stories to believe, but i must say that the phoenix lights bring my experience every time i hear about it.We only saw one orb though. thats all. bye for another 30 years
content.summary: Myself,father,sister and cousin witnessed a strange glowing orb.

content.detailedDescription:
1. traveling north on rt. 154, towards home. 
2. running across road, nearly came to a comlete stop to avoid hitting it.
3. a kangaroo-esque/dinosaur like creature
4. a kangaroo-esque/dinosaur like creature, running for all it was worth, from west to east, across road. it was flesh toned, hairless, human type skin, large round dark sad eyes. large tail, hairless, kept pointed upward. very large hips, like sitting kangaroo, but was running, not hopping. small arms moved to and fro as it ran. around    2-2.5ft tall. turned and looked at car, then kept running. hands were in fists.
5. too shocked to remember detailed features of body and face, may have had teeth. came home and told family of event immediately.
6. ran into cover of woods
content.summary: Alien creature ran across road in front of car.

content.detailedDescription:
On the back porch with my friend. trying to sleep.
2.  because it strage that flashing with orange color and flashing and go circle.
3. i thought maybe it might be helictopper
4. same as above
5.  i do not hear nothing
6. when i go outside and they went straight up!
content.summary: It doing something circle with red flashing it been doing circle and went straight up

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i had been painting my bedroom walls all morning.  i was looking in my closet when i turned around to the outside wall, and inside/under the awning that covers my 48 inch window that faces the street, there were three globes of light.  as soon as i saw them they began to diappear, fading out from right to left, one at a time.  as soon as they disappeared (about one second - it was really fast) i ran out of my room and told my mom and grandmother what i had seen.  my mom raised her eyebrows and my grandmother suggested that perhaps some ets had wanted to see what i was doing in my bedroom.  she told me that often times globes of light were et intelligences.  she told me about brian scott who interacted with these intelligences many years ago.  i was excited, and although it would have been easy to be scared, i wasn't.  i went back to working in my bedroom and nobody saw any more globes of light.  i wonder if i'll ever see them again - i'm going to be working in my room this weekend to finish it up.  i am 13 years old and my grandma is diane johnson, the state section director for mufon ventura and santa barbara counties.  i've been to lots of mufon meetings and there are "alien" things and pictures all around the house.  i've talked to people who have had sightings, but never really thought it would happen to me.  now i'm curious as to why they were here.  btw this happened in the early afternoon - between 1 and 2 pm and it was bright light outside, but the globes, inside the awning were brighter and about 8 inches across.
content.summary: Three globes appeared under the awning to my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo seen darting across the sky at a extremely rapid rate. was about the size of a quarter.  moved across the horizon in under 3 seconds. i barley caught focus of it, but it was glowing a blood red color.  at first i thought it was a  meteor but it was moving across the sky intead of at a downward angle. it seemed to be just above the treeline. i saw it driving south on brandt island road in fairhaven. 

another odd note-- intersections on route six had a light-flashing cop. just waiting. seemed strange, and they were there for roughly 30 minutes (10 minutes after i saw the ufo) this is a totaly unique event in fairhaven, its a very quiet town. delivering pizza for about 2 years and i have never seen this happen. they disbanded about 30 minutes out of town cops returned to their towns and such. area of washington street was blocked from traffic after they disbanded as well.
content.summary: Quick flash of bright red ufo

content.detailedDescription:
1. standing out side at small fire, in back yard
2. looking at stars, came into view
3. ufo
4. moved over trees from south to north, not very fast, was like a dark cloud, but quite small. appeared to be only 200ft above tree tops. traveled across clearing in trees for aboout 2-3 seconds, then lost sight.
5. told brother what i had seen, was a ufo by definition
6. passed across clearing in trees
content.summary: Looking at stars, dark shape passed over head, about 100-200ft above tree tops, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
1. camping in the woods
2. it was a fleet of ufos they were bright
3. i dont know a hot air balloon race.
4. it flew in a line a fleet of ships of all different shapes
5. i blacked out right after it from drinking too much whisky, it helps me with my nerves, however, during i was screaming and hiding in the bushes.
6. i dont remember it flew really good and i blacked out again.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cross,  Disc,  Fireball,  Triangle
content.summary: It came out of the woods  looked like a fleet of space vehicles

content.detailedDescription:
Working for ups, out delevering packages.  i saw in a distance a cluser of bright lights flashing in different colors in a cluster.  it was around 8:30 or so p.M. then it was on the local news a few days later.  a close up shot you can see the detail that is wasn't from here. it looked like a disco ball.  and it was still.  and no noice.
then i went back to work looking at for about a minute.?
content.summary: Near a airport many small balls of different colored lights flashing in a cluster, and some white stand stills.
I was in the  car  at  ngiht  and  i  saw  a  strange light  in  the  sky  .

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from work to home and was watching the clouds while at a stop sign when a formation of four round white disks roughly at 20,000 ft altitude with diameter of about 100 ft in formation of one and three wing shape (similar to us fighter formation) moved laterally into cloud then out and back into cloud.  being a former af pilot, knew this could not be familiar aircraft at that speed or motion.  i pulled over to try to get it on camera but it was too late.  they seemed to stay in or behind the cloud.  many cumulus scattered clouds today.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four round objects into cloud

content.detailedDescription: At about 10'clock on the evening of 13 august 2003, i went outside on the back deck to have a smoke before i went to bed. i gazed up at the night sky to see how many planes and satellites i could see and count before i retired to bed. i just happened to look at an area of the southwestern night sky that was almost devoid of stars when a star-like light suddenly appeared from out of the blackness, grew with the intensity of an automobile's headlamps on high-beam at about a quarter mile away,then faded back out to nothingness without moving. it was as if the "light" was being operated by a "dimmer-switch", and lasted only 5 seconds or so from dim "on" to dim "off", bright white-white in color. the light got so bright that i remember i shielded my eyes and recoiled back thinking the light was shinning at me or coming right at me, much to my embarrassment later. then, approximately 3 seconds later, i observed a very faint meteor streaking out of the northern sky and disappearing in the area of the southwestern sky , midway up, where the light had just disappeared. i put my binoculars on the spot where the light disappeared and saw nothing but blackness. at first i thought i had just witnessed a supernova, but thought otherwise because the event only lasted afew seconds. then i got this feeling that maybe this "light" was not that far away, possibly in orbit or closer, and that the "meteor" was some kind of defense system, and the hair on the back of my neck stood up. afterwards, i went inside and told both my mother and my brother what i had just witnessed outside. the next day at work i heard on the radio that the eastern us was experiencing a massive power outage and i couldn't help but wonder if what i saw the previous night had anything to do with it. since that event, i've been somewhat hesitant to continue looking at the night sky because i cannot satisfactorily explain to myself what the heck it was that i witnessed that night.
content.summary: Star-like light in night sky came on, grow in intensity, then dimmed out completely, followed by very faint meteor streak from the north to where light dimmed out.

content.detailedDescription: Hello:  i went out to walk my cocker spaniel cody around the block, as i do most every night.  it was very dark and clear that night, and i could see many stars. as i was walking down my street, i noticed a very bright orange, or orange yellow object low in the sky almost due east. i've always been very interested in astronomy, and have been an amatuer astronomer since i was a young boy, so the object looked unusual to me.  at first i wondered if it could be the planet jupiter or venus, which are often bright, but this object was too bright for that and the wrong color, and it was in the wrong part of the sky.  it also appeared to be drifting very slowly. i would estimate that it was quite a distance away - to me it looked like a very bright orange star.  it also shown with a very steady light - it didn't twinkle or flicker like most stars do.  i watched it in amazement for a couple of minutes but then continued on my walk around the block.  when i got back to my home, i searched the sky for it again but it was gone completely.  thinking that i may have lost it behind a tree or something (because it was rather low in the sky to start with), i kept looking, but never saw it again.  when i was watching the object, i wondered if it could be a plane, but i doubt that.  i saw no strobe lights or heard any noise whatsoever from it.  the thing that rather held me spellbound about it was the brightness and the orange color.  i put the sighting out of my mind for a few days, but never forgot about it.  after about a week i decided that i should report it to you.  i thought it was too unusual to just ignore.  i am a computer programmer by profession, and consider myself to be rational and detail oriented, and not given to flights of fancy.
content.summary: Bright, orange yellow starlike object, drifting slowly in the sky for several minutes, then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Standing out my back door talking to a friend.I looked up.I looked up and said "what the hell is that".I had no doubt what the object was and after she looked up she had no doubt either.Disk shape silent flashing lights on the bottom solid object looked to be black slow moving west to east toward kent county airport followed a couple minutes later by a passenger jet. isaw this object maybe a minute and then it went into the clouds.My friend told me she had to inportant of a job to say anything and we didnt.I was in awe and i could tell she was quite rattled because we both know what we saw was real espically after the holland  incident.The object went into the clouds.P.S.I bet if someone could get radar image from about that time it may be on there it did show up in holland.
content.summary: Disk shape with flashing lights on bottom solid object

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down sunset dr. w/ a friend.  when coming to the valley of the road, starting up the incline, we spotted something huge just above the treeline.  you couldn't miss it. this was in a neighborhood w/ homes on both sides of the road.  

we both got out of the car, and viewed a very large object (at least 150 ft) hovering above the trees.  seemed light in color (not silver) w/ oval windows around the sides that were colored (maybe pink, green and blue in sections).  

it made no noise, and after several minutes of watching it, it moved quickly up and to the right out of sight.  it moved faster than anything i've ever known of without making any noise.  my friend and i got in the car, turned around to go toward an open field, but never found it again.  

we were very confused about what we saw, and called the greensboro airport authority, and they told us (after transferring us around) that it was probably a jet re-fueler.  that didn't sound right, so we again described what it looked like and what it did, and they said that's what it was.  i have since seen a jet-refueler - and it looks nothing like what we saw.  a jr would make noise - is not that shape, plus it would not be doing manuevers above a residential neighborhood.  

this happened a long time ago, but my memory is vivid.  i am angry that this was laughed off by authorities and i was given misinformation.  the least they could do is say "we don't know", or "it can't be identified".  this is why i am posting it here.  to add - no drinking or drugs were involved in this sighting.
content.summary: Very close proximity to ufo sighted on sunset rd near greensboro country club
Object hovered in one area, then had taken off by the time we stopped the car.
A pink light flew over a hill and over our car and seemed to land about 2 miles away.

content.detailedDescription: I was ziting a maunten
content.summary: I saw a redhear hat that had no face it had wone but it was black real black.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't remember the exact date but sometime last august(2005). i left my parents house for a few months and moved in with my sister just on the other side of town, one of these housing additions you see around here all the time now. anyway one hot night,sticky,and clear,i was doing what i always did, i had been up all night watching t.V. and everything was normal.

keep in mind this is a housing neiborhood so there are houses and streetlights all around.

about 4:20 or 4:25a.M. i was in my bedroom upstairs watching nick at nite. for no apparent reason i suddenly got an urge , not a voice in my head , just an urge to look out the window. i stood up and slowly peaked out the blinds, and when i did, across the street, right underneath a streetlight i saw 3 entities walking,a tall one, a shorter one and a tall one, in that order, the short one was between the tall ones.They were skinny, they had long limbs,slightly larger heads than humans, and they walked funny.

one of the strangest things about this experience was that the exact second i looked out the blinds they were starring at me , like they knew i would look out the blinds at that exact second.Also, they were not walking side by side like three humans most likly would, they were walking in a strait line, and like i said they were walking funny, kinda like zombies in them old zombie movies, backs bent,arms just dangleing,knees bent,like they weren't using much muscle, and heads dangeling aswell but cocked to stare at me.However, because of lighting outside, and in my room, or somthing like that i couldn't tell what color they were or make out any specific facial features,they just looked like black shadows in the streetlight,but not blobs, very well defined,ok.

they kept on starring at me and i kept on starring at them and they kept on walking untill i could not see them anymore cause' they went behind the other houses or something.

once they were out of my sight the next thing i remember was backing away from the window, puting my hands on my head and saying "what do i do now". then i slowly fell to the floor, i could not use my legs at all.So i crawled to my bed and lyed down.I was panicing. i just lyed there in bed, my heart racing,my legs useless,and i've never had a harder time trying to keep my eyes open, but for some reason i was afraid to fall asleep, i thought i would never wake up again.

as i sat there in my bed i thought about screaming for my sister to come help me, and then i even thought about calling 911,but i did'nt, i just laid down and tried to relax,hopeing all these feelings would go away soon, and they did, thank goodness.
after a while i stood up and tried walking, it got better and better and eventually my heart beat went back to normal and i could walk again.

soon after that i fell asleep.

i woke up the next day feeling normal'for the most part'. it was a buityfull day.

eight months later as i write this,the lingering psychological effects are slowly starting to diminish, and im getting better.No physical effects by the way.
content.summary: Three non human ,humanoid entities

content.detailedDescription: While home on leave from the service, we were returning from a christmas dinner from my grandmothers home in elsie. my mom, dad, and brother were in the minivan as well. it was after 9 o clock and the sky was clear and star filled. about 20 minutes into the drive while looking out the passenger side window my mother noticed a luminescent blue sphere shape off to her right in the night sky. (this wouldve been placed true west) i looked at it and it was a solid blue sphere shaped object no blinking lights. it was interesting but nothing to cause any questions or such in our opinion. it was then about 30 sec later my mom blurted out.."look over there." on the east side of the sky (the drivers side) we could see a dark crimson sphere just like the blue one. we then looked over and could see the blue one in the same position that it was holding. my father had been driving about 50 miles an hour at the time due to good road conditions but slowed so we could get a better view of both of these lights. they always remained in front of our vehicle window which i mean to say is that we believed them to be traveling possible faster then us because they never truly moved out of our field of vision. my mom and dad rolled down thier windows to make sure we werent getting some sort of glare off a panel light. both lights were there. it was when my dad stuck his head out the window quickly to look at the red light that it was he noticed a ivory colored light in front of but above the van. my dad slowed down to about 15 to 20 miles so we could see the three objects. they were situated as such. the white sphere was in the midle at a higher level then the other 2. the red sphere was lower on the east side of the road and the blue one was on the west side. it was a triangle pattern. the star field was not blotted out within this formation leading us to believe it was 3 seperate objects. after a minute the white sphere lowered slowly and then lined itself vertically with the other 2. the red and blue sphere's began to move towards the white one and they swapped places. blue going to the east side and the red on the west. they then pulled closer to the white light and increased thier speed and we lost them near a clump of trees situated at m-21 which we were approaching at the time of the last visual contact. my main reaction was a mixture of confusion and astonishment. my adrenaline had me up for a little that night. i would be happy to provide a drawing to submit later for you if interested. thank you.
content.summary: 3 spherical shapes above our van on clear night blue,red,white

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving my car on an interstate highway going home (north, toward minneapolis.)

2. i noticed something strange about the orange spherical object in the sky and kept looking at it.

3. once it began moving sporatically and moving with purpose behind it, i knew right away that it was some kind of intelligence.

4. orange, spherical, it moved from east to west in a sporatic manner, then stopped and another sphere emerged from it and they both remained stationary in the sky.

5. when i knew it was a ufo, i rolled down my window and continued to watch the object as i drove. i began screaming at it, telling it that i knew it was intelligent and that it was "them" and then i told it to do something really weird and once i did that, the object stopped in the westward sky, which is when another sphere emerged from it. i was excited the entire time. 

6. very easily. this happened with a lot of light pollution around me, tall trees and houses. so, when i attempted to exit onto the nearest road to try and continue tracking it with my eyes, i immediately lost these objects.
content.summary: An orange, spherical ufo coasted across the sky in a sporatic manner, stopped, then another sphere emerged from it and they both remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving s. on us31 from peru, approaching grissom afb. initially thought the flash was from airplane, but it hovered then disappeared. i kept looking for airplanes or jet trails. none visible. the sky was clear and only had small puffs of cloud. it was a very small glint of light. like a reflection off of a mirror that momentarily turned my way. i don't know what it was, but i couldn't find a plane in the sky.
content.summary: Flash of light from silver object, no movement then disappeared. not a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was with my dad he went inside of his race car trailer ,and i decided to look up at the sky and i saw a star-like object make several impossible turns and then it took off.
content.summary: A speck of light in the sky made several impossible meneuvers and then it just sorta dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This event was witnessed by my friend and i as we were walking home from school yesterday at appromately 14:50 as we turned down a hill towards our street which is west at the bottom of the hill, we were  facing north north west comming down the hill. i am avid aviation enthusiast so i am familiar with the silhouettes of commerical, military, and civilan, aircraft these object resembled none of the known aircraft. i observed the objects which were equally spaced in a tandem bank to what would be their port sides. the craft then disappeared into the sky which was very overcast at the time but their "glow" could still be faintly seen, when they reappeared about two to 3 seconds later there was only four  and they were in pairs one pair was noticeably higher in altitude and to the left (our perspective) of the other pair. the craft then separated into the clouds individually for about two-three seconds again, when they emerged from the clouds again the fifth had rejoined the formation and they were in a tandem bank to their starboard sides again equally spaced between each other, the continued the bank until their formation was heading west (the formation for both banks was a column) the craft then went into a vertical climb at a very steep angle and at a high rate of speed and disappeared into the clouds again. they reappeared 4 seconds later in a delta formation and were banking to their port sides again, they broke formation and stacked themselves vertically in the center of the sky and hovered for about 25-30 seconds just pulsating, the upper four craft then "slid" down at the same time until the five were level with the horizon and then started another vertical but more gradual climb and proceed to do a "continuous" loop this lasted for 4 seconds they they broke off and i lost them in the clouds. when i reached the bottom of the hill i saw them for the last time before i turned west and caught a glimpse at the craft they were a "sting-ray" shape but were completely smooth, they also looked to be surrounded by a "haze" i last observed them heading northwest three were in the rear and abreast of each other with two leading abreast of each other, the outer most one of the "three" broke formation and slid up under and to the right of the leading two while the two in the rear climbed slightly above the leading three. throught this sighting the craft always maintained vertical and horizontal separation the distance between the craft was consistently equal there was also no sound that was accompaning any of this i lost sight of them in the clouds.
  my reaction to this was i could not believe what i was seeing and was bothered that for the life of me i could not identify what i was witnessing. when i first saw these objects i thought it might have been birds but after observing the first "maneuver" i ruled that out. i was actually mesmorized when i saw it i was excited and scared at the same time. a cessna 172 flew over about 3 minutes later and my friend who has no interest in aviation looked up and said "now thats an airplane." i also filed a report with the national ufo reporting center. i just figured the more people who knew the better chance i might have of getting what i saw confirmed.
content.summary: 5 extreamely bright metallic objects observed in north northwest area of sky (sting-ray shaped)
